overview:
www.spiritin.com helps you connect, share and tribute special people that passed away with yours family members, friends and fans.

This is The first social network to tribute people that passed away!

Do you know any person that has already passed away you want to honor? Someone you want to keep on remembering and pay tribute? What if you could relate this person to other fans, family members, and friends by creating a virtual community? And Free? Spiritin is a real opportunity to pay virtual tributes. In each of the Spiritins created for free, you may write an epitaph, their biography and favorite teatchings, store music, photos, and videos, and invite friends and family to collaborate and joint the spiritinâ€™s community, in the same concept like Orkut and Facebook.

Another cool thing is the Treasure Chest, a virtual protected drive where you can keep your documents such as letters, e-mails, and other things that only you can access.

To be able to use any of these features, all you have to do is register (for free) at www.spiritin.com . After that, you create your spiritin to honor whomever you wish to and start managing it, receiving information online from all possible interactions, and developing the community.

â€œSpiritually connected people do not consent forgetting their ancestorsâ€

You do not need to register to access spiritins. Only if you want to send messages, flowers or a gifts, or yet create spiritins.

Surprisingly this social network was created for remembering loved ones who have already gone. It offers the possibility to pay different types of tributes, such as sending flowers, lighting up candles, and sending messages, as well as a wide range of small memory gifts. Based on a simple interface in a collaborative way the users will find a virtual environment for collabore with pictures, videos, musics and others, registering their deepest feelings and connected with yours friends and family members.

Another very important detail is that you can generate income for users besides creating a Spiritin. You can register as a partner of the social network, receiving a 5% commission over all revenues from your own spiritins, assuming you have their copyright. This is the first social network that renevue the members.

As a real collaborative social network, partners already can develop their own products to be sold at any Spiritins , creating a bigger variety of gifts and memories, receiving 50% of net sales of this products, in the more real concept of web 2.0.

Initially developed in English and Portuguese, www.spiritin.com will receive more languages, following a global collaboration development platform.
